rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
人工智能驱动的 MRI 扫描分析可以为改善多发性硬化症治疗铺平道路探索尖端人工智能 (AI) 技术以更好地分析多发性硬化症 (MS) 患者的 MRI 扫描的新研究可以揭示疾病进展的重要见解，并为改善多发性硬化症患者的治疗铺平道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/AI-driven-analysis-of-MRI-scans-could-pave-the-way-for-improved-multiple-sclerosis-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/AI-driven-analysis-of-MRI-scans-could-pave-the-way-for-improved-multiple-sclerosis-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34291b75-8fd7-4054-9a1f-b8e7a968cbe5 Mon, 04 Sep 2023 03:54:00 -0400 AI-driven analysis of MRI scans could pave the way for improved multiple sclerosis treatment
NPL 科学家的新突破可能会改变癌症治疗国家物理实验室 (NPL) 科学家的新突破将改变英国和全世界的癌症治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/New-breakthroughs-by-NPL-scientists-could-transform-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/New-breakthroughs-by-NPL-scientists-could-transform-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f9fee3a-88bb-4be2-9aa9-060f0ddf1b9e Mon, 04 Sep 2023 03:52:00 -0400 New breakthroughs by NPL scientists could transform cancer treatment
一些社区对有关基因组学的对话表示不信任和愤世嫉俗今天发表在《人类遗传学和基因组学进展》上的新研究揭示了在基因组学和医疗保健方面代表性不足的社区参与时“我们所说的”和“人们听到的”之间的差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Some-communities-express-mistrust-and-cynicism-in-response-to-conversations-about-genomics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Some-communities-express-mistrust-and-cynicism-in-response-to-conversations-about-genomics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=359ed294-8770-4fce-9928-710be63ba3a6 Mon, 04 Sep 2023 03:35:00 -0400 Some communities express mistrust and cynicism in response to conversations about genomics
更快的心理健康治疗可以减轻 NHS 的财务负担，改善治疗结果该研究是迄今为止规模最大的同类研究之一，分析了匿名数据，由 ieso Digital Health Ltd 与多塞特医疗大学 NHS 信托基金和约克健康经济联盟（约克大学的一部分）合作进行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Faster-mental-health-treatment-could-reduce-financial-burden-on-the-NHS-improve-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Faster-mental-health-treatment-could-reduce-financial-burden-on-the-NHS-improve-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0be72b90-19e2-4a47-8d21-241870ed1a6c Mon, 04 Sep 2023 03:32:00 -0400 Faster mental health treatment could reduce financial burden on the NHS, improve outcomes
心脏健康检查召回试点计划显示出早期发现心血管疾病的希望心脏基金会的一项试点计划通过全科医生诊所的短信召回处于危险中的澳大利亚人，该计划被视为潜在的救星。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Heart-Health-Check-Recall-pilot-program-shows-promise-in-early-detection-of-cardioangio-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Heart-Health-Check-Recall-pilot-program-shows-promise-in-early-detection-of-cardioangio-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d9a0eaa-f2c1-4dfe-90a3-187ff2aeb5f2 Mon, 04 Sep 2023 03:29:00 -0400 Heart Health Check Recall pilot program shows promise in early detection of cardiovascular disease
机器学习有助于识别可预测癌症风险的代谢生物标志物南澳大利亚大学的一项新研究发现了一系列代谢生物标志物，可以帮助预测癌症风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Machine-learning-helps-identify-metabolic-biomarkers-that-c​​ould-predict-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Machine-learning-helps-identify-metabolic-biomarkers-that-c​​ould-predict-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aaccebf9-ea60-4208-b9c7-41be58ed93a7 Mon, 04 Sep 2023 03:27:00 -0400 Machine learning helps identify metabolic biomarkers that could predict cancer risk
调查凸显人们对致命的慢性胃酸反流缺乏认识一项新的调查显示，英国人对食管裂孔疝和慢性胃酸反流的原因和症状缺乏了解。尽管 50 岁以上的人中有三分之一患有食管裂孔疝，并且 1300 万人患有慢性胃酸反流，但仍取得了这些结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Survey-highlights-the-lack-of-awareness-about-deadly-chronic-acid-reflux.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Survey-highlights-the-lack-of-awareness-about-deadly-chronic-acid-reflux.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=28b32ac8-3f34-49d1-8610-3312404b0453 Mon, 04 Sep 2023 03:25:00 -0400 Survey highlights the lack of awareness about deadly chronic acid reflux
研究显示 71% 的英国男性整晚难以入睡男性保健公司 Numan 的最新研究表明，英国男性存在睡眠危机，71% 的受访男性整夜难以入睡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Research-reveals-7125-of-men-in-the-UK-are-struggling-to-sleep-through-the-night.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Research-reveals-7125-of-men-in-the-UK-are-struggling-to-sleep-through-the-night.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae40fbc0-bee8-49f2-896d-700e734a3280 Mon, 04 Sep 2023 03:20:00 -0400 Research reveals 71% of men in the UK are struggling to sleep through the night
九月开学和上大学的学生患严重疾病的风险增加一位领先的检测专家担心，随着学生在九月份开始上学，将会出现一场完美的感染风暴。新冠疫情封锁期间学校停课，这意味着今年开始上大学的八分之一的学生仍然无法预防脑膜炎。人们越来越担心早期症状可能与新生流感相混淆。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Students-starting-school-and-college-in-September-are-at-increased-risk-of-serious-illnesses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Students-starting-school-and-college-in-September-are-at-increased-risk-of-serious-illnesses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d65c65fc-5edc-41a0-9b71-1285a1458386 Mon, 04 Sep 2023 03:16:00 -0400 Students starting school and college in September are at increased risk of serious illnesses
UVA Health 获得 NIH 资助，用于测试管理 2 型糖尿病的全新方法美国国立卫生研究院提供了 350 万美元用于一项大规模临床试验，测试一种治疗 2 型糖尿病的全新方法，在早期的一项研究中，该方法使近 70% 的参与者在没有减肥或药物治疗的情况下病情得到缓解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/UVA-Health-receives-NIH-grant-for-testing-radical-new-approach-to-managing-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/UVA-Health-receives-NIH-grant-for-testing-radical-new-approach-to-managing-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ed417f5-6250-4410-80e1-18a308a20e75 Mon, 04 Sep 2023 03:12:00 -0400 UVA Health receives NIH grant for testing radical new approach to managing type 2 diabetes
